title: The Secrets of Cottonwood Creek
description: In this Dateline classic, Fred and Leslie Mueller are weeks away from celebrating their 27th wedding anniversary when a photo-op during a hike goes horribly wrong. Andrea Canning reports. Originally aired on NBC on May 30, 2014.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
